description: My place is close to Clinton St. Baking Company, The Meatball Shop, Pianos, La Esquina, and Mission Chinese Food. You’ll love my place because of the location and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets).
name: In the heart of the heart of the Lower East Side!
review: James is a wonderful host with an amazing apartment. The location couldn't be better and my stay was exactly how you should do NYC!
